MajorClaims.Text: television has more positive effects than negative effects
I strongly disagree with the statement that television has negative effects on children

Claims.Text: the television can have violent programs
television has useful and educational programs
Tv is helpful to relieve our stresses

Premises.Text: if children can use Tv programs wisely, there are more positive effects than negative effects
it has useful and educational programs and quite helpful to relieve stresses for children
Not only the up-to-date news, but also there are many programs which has educational purposes
If children can use those programs wisely, they can learn many information from it
in Korea, there's program called EBS
It is targeted for children to teenager
We can study subjects through EBS lecture
there are many documentary films such as the life of a great man in Korea
Using those education programs let people get a lot of inspirations instead of having negative effects
Many children have a lot of stresses recently
they have so much pressure about study
When they are watching sports programs, it's easy to relieve those stresses
I got too much stress from the school
After I watch the soccer match between Korea and Japan, the stress was gone
this soccer match helped me to continue my academic career in the school
it helped me to relieve my stress
